alert.note: Alert for Adams; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Adams and northeastern Kearney Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Heartwell, or 15 miles southeast of Kearney. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heartwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
